overview: The discovery of @SantaRamonaMemes, a Tiktok account led by a group of tweens, threatens the adult world of a stagnant town. The Santa Ramona Meme Show is a short film that shows the ridiculous fight between modernity and tradition, entering into a town full of boomers, cringe and cream-filled croissants.
tagline: POV: YOUR AN EARLY HOMINID AND YOU SMELLED A SUPER APETECIBLE PREHISTORIC EQUIVALENT OF XUXO DE CREMA IN THIS DIRECTION => =>
title: The Santa Ramona Meme Show
